name: The Church of Cheesus Crisp: An All You can Pray Buffet
name_original: The Church of Cheesus Crisp: An All You can Pray Buffet
description:
You are Fr. Salad, the pastor of The Church of Cheesus Crisp. You've been given the holy book to tell each parishioner a parable, a life lesson you might say.  Complete each mini-game to give each Food Person a blessing, or let sin prevail. Get the high score and get them warm, fuzzy, good good feels.

Note: This game is part of the Locally Sourced Summer Bundle. The price will be reduced once the bundle is over.

Art: Rachelle Viola
